name: rbc.ru - ads cleaner 2011
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("rbc.ru"), domain("rbc.ua")
{
.header,
.topHead,
div[id="copyrights"],
div[class="footer copyrights"],
div[class="copyright"],
div[class="bottom10 whiteBg"],
div[class="top10 bottom10 whiteBg"],
div[id="bottomMenu"],
div[class="notes"],
div[id="impBanner"],
td[class="rightPart"],
td[valign="top"],
div[id="counters"],
a[href="http://memori.ru/link/"],
.topBanner,
.leftBanner,
.main.creditInf,
.main.iGlobeInf,
.main.auto,
.main.autoBottom,
#informer,
#informersdivcenter,
TD[width="234"][align="center"],
#mlph629,
#mlph1131,
#mlph1130,
#medialand_adland_inline_div_1137,
#medialand_adland_inline_div_1129,
#medialand_adland_inline_div_1136,
#medialand_adland_inline_div_1119,
#medialand_adland_inline_div_1133,
.cnews-tech,
.b-bottom,
embed,
.rightBanner {display:none !important;}

div[class="bigNews commonTextBlock"] {}
}
